name: Fated Flatline
description:
Fated Flatline is a RPG about taking your pills! Nurse Ivy is here to help Jon through a severe condition he is suffering through. Follow her instructions and you might just be able to be saved!

Featuring

  • An Undertale inspired battle system with a unique twist!
  • Stellar character design and expressive animations by Joe Garretson!
  • Attack sprites designed by Christian Morcos!
  • A wonderful original soundtrack composed by Noah Blomberg!
  • Multiple endings!
  • ...and...only one boss fight? hm idk i can't count

The game was developed in three months and is heavily inspired by Toby Fox's Undertale.

This game was created by:
Josh Rieg - Programmer, Writer

Joe Garretson -  Character Artist, Animator

Christian Morcos -  Attack Artist, Animator

Sam Ashley - Concept Artist
